evidence.text: Plaintiff C.M., now 29 years old, was 27 years old at the time of the forced separation described in this Complaint. She is the mother of Plaintiff B.M., now seven years old, who was five years old at the time of the separation. C.M. and B.M. are nationals of Guatemala and are presently seeking asylum in the United States.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs: Individual, described as Guatemalan mothers and their children seeking asylum in the United States.

evidence.text: R. Stanton Jones, Jonathan H. Feinberg, Daniel Jacobson, Kairys, Rudovsky, Messing, Feinberg, Emily Reeder, Arnold & Porter Kaye Scholer LLP, National Immigrant Justice Center

evidence.text: Defendant United States of America is the appropriate defendant under the FTCA.
